titleStmt.title: The humble desires and propositions of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, presented to the Kings Most Excellent Majesty at his court at Oxford, February 3. 1642. : With His Maiesties answer thereunto, and six propositions propounded by him to both houses, to be debated upon, with the rest. / Die Lunæ. Feb. 6. 1642. Ordered by the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, that these propositions, with His Majesties answer thereunto shall be forthwith printed and published. ; Io. Browne cler. Parliamentorum.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
Browne, John, ca. 1608-1691.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

publicationStmt.publisher: Feb. 7. Printed for Iohn Wright in the Old Bailey.,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Sutro Library.
